questions.prompt: What is the time complexity of binary search on a sorted array of n elements?
questions.explanation: Binary search divides the search space in half with each comparison, resulting in logarithmic time complexity.

questions.prompt: Which of the following are valid HTTP methods? (Select all that apply)
questions.explanation: GET, POST, and DELETE are standard HTTP methods. FETCH and SEND are not valid HTTP methods (though 'fetch' is a JavaScript API).

questions.prompt: In Git, what command is used to create a new branch and switch to it in one step?
questions.explanation: Both 'git checkout -b <branch>' and the newer 'git switch -c <branch>' create and switch to a new branch in one command.
